resources.string: Coaching you to a healthier and more active life
üçé Generate Best Diet As Per Your Health
This information lets Fit estimate calories, distance, and the intensity of your activity. You also get coaching that tailored to you.
Fit can track walking, running and cycling in the background. This means you get metrics like steps, distance, and calories for all these activities.
To do this, the app needs permission to recognize your activity. Over time, Fit also uses this data to personalize your experience, and better recognize activity.
If you choose to turn this setting off, you can still manually track workouts with Fit.
Allow Fit to access your physical activity?
Keep moving each day to meet your steps goal and avoid sedentary time
You score Heart Points for doing activities at a higher pace, like taking a brisk walk. Increases the intensity to earn more points.
